parsed.title: O mito sangrento de Simão de Trento e sua sombra moderna
parsed.summary: Em 1475, a misteriosa morte de um menino em Trento foi transformada em um libelo de sangue, alimentado por pregações inflamadas, tortura e uma suposta incorruptibilidade que selou a culpa dos judeus. Décadas de perseguição, confisco de bens e um culto que perdurou por séculos foram manipulados para servir a interesses políticos e econômicos. Mais de cinco séculos depois, o mesmo mito ressurgiu nas redes digitais, inspirando um jovem extremista a atacar uma sinagoga nos Estados Unidos, mostrando ... [truncated 47 chars]

scenes.narration: A rope snaps around his throat, the strappado begins, and a child's fate hangs in terror.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a dim stone courtroom, a wooden rack with a rope coiled, shadows stretching across cold stone walls, faint candlelight flickering.
scenes.motionDescription: Slow dolly forward toward the wooden rack, rope swaying violently, candle flames flickering softly, dust particles drifting in the cold air.
scenes.audioDescription: Heavy creaking of wood, rope tightening, distant murmurs, subtle heartbeat thump

scenes.narration: Friar Bernardino's fiery sermons had already poisoned Trento, turning whispers into accusations against the Jewish families.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a stone altar draped in red banners, a stern friar raising a hand, shadows engulfing the congregation.
scenes.motionDescription: Gentle left pan across the stone altar, red banners fluttering, friar’s cloak swaying in the dim light.
scenes.audioDescription: Echoing chant, distant murmurs, rustling fabric, low drum thud

scenes.narration: Samuel de Nuremberg found the child's limp corpse in his cellar, trembling, and rushed to the authorities.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a cramped stone cellar, a pale child’s body lying on wet stones, Samuel’s shocked face illuminated by a single lantern.
scenes.motionDescription: Slow zoom in on the lifeless child, lantern light flickering, water droplets glistening on stone walls.
scenes.audioDescription: Soft clank of lantern, distant dripping water, hushed gasp

scenes.narration: Under the brutal squassada, accused Jews screamed, their words twisted to fit the bishop’s murderous narrative.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a stone torture chamber, a wooden rack, ropes binding a trembling figure, harsh torchlight casting grotesque shadows.
scenes.motionDescription: Subtle tilt up from bound hands to anguished faces, torch flames licking the stone walls, shadows shifting.
scenes.audioDescription: Rope creaking, muffled cries, crackling fire, distant echo of a bishop’s voice demanding confession

scenes.narration: When the body was lifted, it remained untouched by decay, a 'miracle' sealing the false verdict.
scenes.visualDescription: Dark cinematic digital painting, concept art style, heavy chiaroscuro lighting, painterly textures with cinematic composition, moody and atmospheric, a dim crypt, the child's corpse on a stone slab, a faint glow surrounding it, priests gazing in awe.
scenes.motionDescription: Slow push‑in toward the stone slab, faint ethereal glow pulsing around the body, dust swirling.
scenes.audioDescription: Whispered prayers, distant organ note, subtle wind through cracks, heartbeat thudding faintly

backgroundMusic.prompt: Dark Ambient, Low Drone Synths, Sparse Piano Notes, Tension Strings, Eerie Pads, Subtle Heartbeat Rhythm, Minor Key, well-arranged composition, 70 BPM

  "title": "O mito sangrento de Simão de Trento e sua sombra moderna",
  "summary": "Em 1475, a misteriosa morte de um menino em Trento foi transformada em um libelo de sangue, alimentado por pregações inflamadas, tortura e uma suposta incorruptibilidade que selou a culpa dos judeus. Décadas de perseguição, confisco de bens e um culto que perdurou por séculos foram manipulados para servir a interesses políticos e econômicos. Mais de cinco séculos depois, o mesmo mito ressurgiu nas redes digitais, inspirando um jovem extremista a atacar uma sinagoga nos Estados Unidos, mostrando como a propaganda de ódio pode atravessar eras.",
